data.name: CroNix - Silver starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
This pack is recommended to those who need a quicker & powerful start. It includes following items;.

  • 7-day Booster : You’ll get 150% XP and Seeds after each match.
  • 20 Kits : You can get a free item after each round.
  • 20 Premium Kits : You can get additional free item after each round.
  • 5000 Seeds : This is the soft currency used in in-game store.
  • “Bishop” Title : A title is displayed above the character’s name.
  • “Silver Starter” Emblem : An emblem is an icon representing the player.
  • 1 Rare-grade card pack : Includes a rare Skill card that can alter the character’s skill. This pack has cards for starting characters only.

data.short_description: If you need a quicker & powerful start, this is what you need! This pack includes a 7-day Booster(150% XP & Seed), 20 Kits and 20 Premium Kits(free item after a match), 5000 Seeds(soft currency), and a Rare-grade card pack. Start ahead of most players with Silver Starter Pack!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window XP SP 3 or higher
  • Processor: Dual 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9600 GT or Radeon HD 3600
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window XP SP 3 or higher
  • Processor: i3 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260 or Radeon HT 4870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
